nodes.text: The Fordon system was a star system located within the Savareen sector of the Outer Rim Territories. By 7 ABY, the Quarren pirate Jerresk visited the Fordon system after carrying out a raid on a New Republic supply ship traveling to the Karthakk sector's Musson system. That year, the former system was listed by the New Republic General Airen Cracken within the datafile Wanted by Cracken as Jerresk's last known location.

The Fordon system was first mentioned in the 1993 Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game supplement Wanted by Cracken, which was written by Louis J. Prosperi for West End Games. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the system in grid square Q-16.
